FuncDef:
The bgp default ipv4-unicast-config disable command disables the configuration of commands that belong to the IPv4 unicast address family in the BGP view.
The undo bgp default ipv4-unicast-config disable command restores the default configuration. The bgp default ipv4-unicast-config disable command disables the configuration of commands that belong to the IPv4 unicast address family in the BGP view. The undo bgp default ipv4-unicast-config disable command restores the default configuration. By default, the commands of the IPv4 unicast address family can be configured in the BGP view.
